review: Yes I was expecting the movie to be a horror film, but it didn't turn out that way for me! But I think that they made a good choice on putting Katie Holmes in the movie I hope she gets into more movies and more better horror films! The movie was still good for me even if some people say it was dumb! At least it had a point to it!
